name: The Button Game (Enderless)
description:
There may be some secrets spread around our social media links. It was all supposed to end after the game jam, but since I'm not satisfied with the state of the game so the charade goes on...

Read on for drama spooks galore.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Welcome to The Button Game! 

This game pushes the limit of the household vr device with state of the art simulation practices. You won't believe your eyes nor hands when you interact with our buttons!

Just make sure you press the button when you hop on! The button is ready to be pressed by anyone in the world!

Everyone should press the button. The button is ready to be pressed.

Press the button like everyone else.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

So I actually was having bad technical issues and haven't even tested the file I put in here. Huh. Hopefully it runs. It's a quest 2 file. I literally tried for 2 hours before the deadline and then just said screw it and threw it in. 

There's a good bit of lore stuff I have to post and then I'm gonna update the game and post more on reddit.  It's already really close, just some really fundamental setbacks happened late into development and, well, that's just the name of the game!

I'm gonna head to sleep and get some more work done later. ^^
